Class NetworkCalcPrice

java.lang.Object
NetworkCalcPrice
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkVisitor
public class NetworkCalcPrice extends Object implements NetworkVisitor
visitor class. It can visit any NetworkElement object to get its price.
